title.narrative: Anticipatory livelihood protection to minimise drought impacts and safeguard food security

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to protect livelihoods and safeguard food and nutrition security of vulnerable households from the adverse impacts of drought and other recent shocks. This FAO project 1) distributes livestock assistance package, 2) provides unconditional cash transfers and cash for work activities and 3) provides training, information dissemination and awareness building on key protection messages and COVID-19 among other activities. The project provides life-saving assistance to 245,000 people, including 50,000 women, 48,000 men, 145,000 children, and 6,600 people with disabilities.
